targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  TS AS "time",
  Device AS metric,
  Temperature
FROM Xiaomi_Temperature_Sensors_Lviv
WHERE
  Device = 'zigbee2mqtt/0x00158d0003f0d65e'
ORDER BY TS

SELECT
  TS AS "time",
  Device AS metric,
  Temperature
FROM Xiaomi_Temperature_Sensors_Lviv
WHERE
  Device = 'zigbee2mqtt/0x00158d000411b5b2'
ORDER BY TS

  TS AS "time",

SELECT
  TS AS "time",
  Device AS metric,
  Pressure * 3 / 4
FROM Xiaomi_Temperature_Sensors_Lviv
WHERE
  Device = 'zigbee2mqtt/0x00158d0003f0d65e'
ORDER BY TS

SELECT
  TS AS "time",
  'Кухня d65e' AS metric,
  Temperature
FROM Xiaomi_Temperature_Sensors_Lviv
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(TS) and
  Device like '%d65e'
ORDER BY TS

SELECT
  TS AS "time",
  'Рояль d5b8' AS metric,
  Temperature
FROM Xiaomi_Temperature_Sensors_Lviv
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(TS) and
  Device like '%d5b8'
ORDER BY TS

SELECT
  TS AS "time",
  'Маленькая b5da' AS metric,
  Temperature
FROM Xiaomi_Temperature_Sensors_Lviv
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(TS) and
  Device like '%b5da'
ORDER BY TS

SELECT
  TS AS "time",
  'Столовая b5b2' AS metric,
  Temperature
FROM Xiaomi_Temperature_Sensors_Lviv
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(TS) and
  Device like '%b5b2'
ORDER BY TS

SELECT
  TS AS "time",
  Device AS metric,
  Humidity
FROM Xiaomi_Temperature_Sensors_Lviv
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(TS)
ORDER BY TS

SELECT
  TS AS "time",
  Device AS metric,
  truncate(Pressure * 3 / 4, 0)
FROM Xiaomi_Temperature_Sensors_Lviv
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(TS)
ORDER BY TS

SELECT Battery from zigbee2mqtt.Xiaomi_Temperature_Sensors_Lviv
where Battery is not null and 
Device like '%b5b2'
order by id DESC limit 1
